canvas.rationale: 24dp canvas with 20dp live area provides consistent spacing and prevents edge clipping

alignment.rationale: Optical centering ensures visual balance even when mathematical center doesn't look right

keylines.rationale: Keylines provide consistent sizing across different shape types

grid_system.rationale: Even numbers provide better pixel alignment and visual consistency

live_area_guidelines.rationale: Primary content stays within safe zone, decorative elements can use full live area
